description:
Nobunaga starts gathering information on the leader of the Ikko religion, Hongan-ji Kennyo. Kennyo is known to financially assist daimyos in the area, and it would be bad if he turned against Nobunaga. Nobunaga sends Chidori to Hongan-ji to see what Kennyo was up to.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ne pas réveiller le chat qui dort
さわらぬ仏にたたり無し
